definition: to follow/to comply with/varying according to.../to allow/subsequently

(main) hall/large room for a specific purpose/CL:間|间[jian1]/relationship between cousins etc on the paternal side of a family/of the same clan/classifier for classes, lectures etc/classifier for sets of furniture

sentences.english: We will have two in-class quizzes.
sentences.chinese: 我們將會舉行兩次的隨堂測驗。

sentences.english: On the quiz or test next week or--on Thursday--we'll give you three--at least three plays. Robert?
sentences.chinese: 下週或者週四的隨堂測驗裏我會放三個，羅伯特？

sentences.english: Hey class. We may have a prelim next Monday morning.
sentences.chinese: 同學們，下週一我們將進行一次隨堂測驗。
